name: MungerMoments
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The legendary Charlie Munger has long been known for his insights and wisdom. Much more than the Vice Chairman of Berkshire-Hathaway, Munger's uniquely rational approach to problem-solving and his techniques for avoiding common human misjudgment have served as a framework of thinking for many highly successful people.
Charlie has fans all over the world who cite his mental models as their guiding light when making decisions and solving problems. 
Never heard of Charlie Munger? Enable this flashbriefing and get to know this phenomenal thinker.

*An unofficial flash briefing tribute to Charlie Munger. Munger Moments does not represent or have any official relationship with Charlie Munger or any of his businesses.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
